original_title: Rage Against the Machine: Revolution USA?
overview: This documentary chronicles the history of Rage Against the Machine and provides interviews with a variety of Rage fans. Be warned, however, that this is not an authorized documentary and contains minimal footage of the band itself. Though there is a brief interview with Tom Morello, this video contains no footage from performances or significant chat sessions with the band.
title: Rage Against the Machine: Revolution USA?
